alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Pope; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 5:13PM CDT until April 15 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Stone County in north central Arkansas... Southern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Northern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marshall to Rocky Hill to near Dabney, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton... Marshall... Thola... Marsena... Kay... Rocky Hill... Dabney... Solo... Smyrna... Bohannon... Elba... Woolum... Imo... Old Lexington... Elberta... Watts... Blanchard Springs Campground... Leslie... Big Flat... Zach... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Pope; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren
